column2: ???: *Knocks on door* Kuya, it's time to begin training.
column3: Kuya: I don't need it, I've been chucking rocks since I was a prepubescent.

column2: Master Khoshah: I know you're good, just prove it to me and then we can get on with your assessment.
Master Khoshah: Get dressed and meet me downstairs.
